product_name: Jagwire Disc Pads for Tektro Lyra / IOX Brakes
long_description: These replacement brake pads from Jagwire are designed for Tektro Lyra and IOX disc brakes. HeatShield(R) technology resists heat buildup so brakes stay cool and improve control in critical situations. Semimetallic compound offers quiet, reliable and long-lasting performance. Springs included. Set of 2.
short_description: These replacement brake pads from Jagwire are designed for Tektro Lyra and IOX disc brakes.
